translations: n.重读；强调；增强；加重音符号

phrs.translation: 加重, 重读, 强调, 重读法
加重效应, 呈现出放大效应
强化训练, 加强训练, 详细翻译
回路加重, 提高轮郎的明显性, 提高图像中物体轮廓的明显性

sentences.sentence: The real problem , again , is the accentuation of already bad habits .
sentences.translation: 真正的问题，还是要强调这种既成习惯的坏处。

sentences.sentence: Three experiments were carried out to investigate the role accentuation plays in spoken discourse comprehension.
sentences.translation: 用三个实验探索了重读在口语语篇理解加工中的作用。

sentences.sentence: Two experiments are carried out to investigate the role consistent accentuation plays in spoken discourse comprehension.
sentences.translation: 该研究两个实验探索了一致性重读在口语语篇理解加工中的作用。
